text: Jermaine Allen (born November 30, 1983) is an American Football running back who has been active for the Kiel Baltic Hurricanes (Germany) since December 2009. ==External links== *Chicago Bears bio *New Orleans Saints bio Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:English players of American football Category:American football running backs Category:British American Football League players Category:Hamburg Sea Devils players Category:Chicago Bears players Category:New Orleans Saints players Category:People educated at Ernest Bevin College Category:Alumni of Staffordshire University Category:Sportspeople from London
title: Jermaine Allen
